t: KICIMPRO Brand Kitchen Faucets Recalled Due to Dangerous Lead Exposure for Young Children; Sold on Amazon.com by Kicimpro | CPSC.gov
s: Consumers should immediately stop using these faucets and contact Kicimpro about disposal and a refund. t: CPSC Warns Consumers to Immediately Stop Using VESLA HOME Brand Kitchen Faucets Sold on Amazon.com Due to Dangerous Lead Exposure for Young Children | CPSC.gov
s: WASHINGTON, D.C. – The U.S. Consumer Product Safety Commission (CPSC) is warning consumers to immediately stop using VESLA HOME brand kitchen faucets sold on Amazon.com. The faucets were tested and found to contain lead that can leach into water at levels that can be particularly harmful ...
